description: Almost 70% back measures to reduce the number of lawmakers by a third.
title: Italians vote to slash size of parliament by a third
title_page: Italians vote to slash size of parliament by a third - BBC News
maintext: It was held alongside several key regional elections, where the results were seen as a setback for far-right League leader Matteo Salvini and a boost for the centre left Democratic Party, which is part of Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte's coalition government with the populist Five Star movement.
